suite.name: script_003_DNF Unit of use quantity reference set (700000131000036101)

test.name: 01 Some 700000131000036101 [Unit of use quantity reference set] entries exist

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select count(*) from rf2_cr_ccsrefset_active where refsetId = 700000131000036101;

test.name: 02 700000131000036101 [Unit of use quantity reference set] is a child of 700001351000036100|Measurement type float (foundation metadata concept)
03a All active referencedComponents are active 30348011000036104 [has MPUU] or 30409011000036107 [has TPUU] relationships

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from rf2_cr_ccsrefset_active where refsetId = 700000131000036101 and referencedComponentId not in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active where typeId in (30348011000036104,30409011000036107));

test.name: 03b All active 30348011000036104 [has MPUU] or 30409011000036107 [has TPUU] relationships are actively referenced (except where sourceId IS MPP,TPP,CTPP)

parameter.name: query

test.name: 04 All UnitIds are Kinds of 30428011000036107 [unit of measure]

parameter.name: query

test.name: 05 All OperatorIds are Kinds of 700001311000036104 [Operator id value]

parameter.name: query
query
query

test.name: 08 All UoU.Quantities are greater than zero

parameter.name: query
